subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Lava Man has won all seven of his races this year, including four victories in Grade I races, and by most reckoning is the major obstacle to Bernardini’s sweeping Horse of the Year honors.
snippet: Lava Man has won all seven of his races this year, including four victories in Grade I races, and by most reckoning is the major obstacle to Bernardini’s sweeping Horse of the Year honors.
